text: Allakh - tot, kto sozdal vas, potom nadelil vas [sredstvami k sushchestvovaniyu]. Potom On umertvit vas i uzh zatem ozhivit. Yest' li sredi tekh, komu vy poklonyayetes' naryadu s Nim, [takiye], kto sotvoril by chto-libo podobnoye? Prechist On i prevyshe tekh, komu oni poklonyayutsya naryadu s Nim
